Class IDVersion

java.lang.Object
  be.belgium.eid.objects.IDVersion
All Implemented Interfaces:
SmartCardReadable
public class IDVersion
extends java.lang.Object
implements SmartCardReadable

The IDPIN class contains the version information of the smart card.

Version:
1.0.0 24 Mar 2007
Author:
Kristof Overdulve

                 byte componentCode,

                 byte globalOSVersion,
                 byte appletInterfaceVersion,
                 byte pkcs1Support,
                 byte keyExchangeVersion,
                 byte applicationLifeCycle,
                 IDTokenInfo tokenInfo)
Initializes the version information with the given information.

Parameters:
chipNumber - is the chip number
componentCode - is the component code
osNumber - is the OS number
osVersion - is the OS version
softmaskNumber - is the softmask number
softmaskVersion - is the softmask version
appletInterfaceVersion - is the applet interface version
pkcs1Support - is the PKCS1 support byte
keyExchangeVersion - is the key exchange version
applicationLifeCycle - is the application life cycle byte
globalOSVersion - is the global OS version
appletVersion - is the version of the applet
tokenInfo - is the information about the tokens
Method Detail

parse

public static IDVersion parse(byte[] characterStreamVersion,
                              byte[] characterStreamToken)
                       throws BufferTooSmallException
Parses the given characterstreams in version information and token information to result in a fully initialized IDVersion object.

Parameters:
characterStreamVersion - is the character stream to parse to get the version information
characterStreamToken - is the character stream to parse to get the token information
Returns:
a fully initialized version information object
Throws:
BufferTooSmallException - when the buffer of the characters was too small to get valid data from
